TopicTitle: Future KSP Versions Feature Request List

Articles.Content:
Hey guys I'm making a crowd-sourced feature request list for future versions of KSP. Let's get the most popular and desired features into this game!

http://www.topchart.io/lists/kerbal-space-program-feature-requests

Sorry about the FB log-in required.
These suggestions for the game's development have been moved to Suggestions and Development Discussion.
Bug fixes and UI enhancements. I'm not letting that thing have access to my Facebook account.

I'm pretty sure Squad has a list of things they want in the game, and a list of stuff we want in the game.

I have no Facebook account so I can't say that on the page.

Bug fixes and UI enhancements. I'm not letting that thing have access to my Facebook account.

lol all good I'll add them!

- - - Updated - - -

I'm pretty sure Squad has a list of things they want in the game, and a list of stuff we want in the game.

Let know if you find that list 5th!

Closest you will get to a solid list is :-

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Planned_features

Or the "what not to suggest list" which frankly could use a Post-Release clean-up.

I'm not just suggesting this because it would give us clues as to plans post Unity 5 mega update.
Make the vessel rename function in tracking station easier to find.
Ground crew walking and supply trucks driving around the space center in the overview view , just like inside the VAB and SPH
Support for iOS. Or cloud, snow, and wind. A way  to prevent ships from wobbling.

Show direction of orbit on active and target vessels, as on satellite contracts

Show altitude and velocity together, and on map view as well

Place navball somewhere else but the center of the screen 

Fix issue with Kerbal portrait drawings hugely slowing down fps rate

Kill the Kraken already
